title: How to Get the Coin Case in Pokémon Ruby

steps.title: Get to Mauville City.
steps.content: Get to Mauville City. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Find a yellow looking house on the left side of the Poké Mart.
steps.content: Find a yellow looking house on the left side of the Poké Mart. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Head inside and talk to the lady.
steps.content: Head inside and talk to the lady.

steps.title: When the lady is finished talking, hand her over the Harbor Mail.
steps.content: When the lady is finished talking, hand her over the Harbor Mail. [3] X Research source

steps.title: In return, the lady will give you the Coin Case.
steps.content: In return, the lady will give you the Coin Case. [4] X Research source
